name: Torch Domain Auction Bot
description: Domain lending protocol on Solana. Domains become tokens. Tokens become collateral. Top holder controls the domain. Borrow SOL against your position -- but get liquidated and you lose the domain. The bot discovers domains, launches them as Torch Market tokens, monitors lending positions, and auto-liquidates underwater loans through a Torch Vault. When a borrower is liquidated, their collateral changes hands and the domain lease rotates to the new top holder. The agent keypair is disposable. All value routes through the vault. Built on torchsdk v3.7.23.

env.name: VAULT_CREATOR
env.description: Vault creator pubkey -- identifies which Torch Vault the bot operates through. Required.

env.name: SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Disposable controller keypair (base58 or byte array JSON). Optional -- the bot generates a fresh keypair in-process if not provided (recommended).

install.label: Install Torch Domain Auction Bot (npm, optional -- SDK is bundled in lib/torchsdk/, kit (bot + scraper) is in lib/kit/)

actions.name: TORCH_DISCOVER_DOMAINS
actions.description: Scrape expiring and available domains, evaluate resale potential, generate ticker symbols

actions.name: TORCH_LAUNCH_DOMAIN_TOKEN
actions.description: Launch a domain as a Torch Market token -- bonding curve creates the initial market, migration links the domain to the token permanently

actions.name: TORCH_SCAN_LENDING_MARKETS
actions.description: Discover all domain tokens with active lending and check for underwater positions

actions.name: TORCH_SCORE_POSITION
actions.description: Score a borrower's loan risk across four factors: LTV proximity, price momentum, wallet reputation, interest burden

actions.name: TORCH_LIQUIDATE
actions.description: Liquidate an underwater domain loan (LTV > 65%) via vault -- collateral tokens change hands, domain lease rotates to new top holder

actions.name: TORCH_ROTATE_LEASE
actions.description: Check top holder of a domain token and rotate the domain lease if holder changed (e.g. after liquidation or large purchase)

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT
actions.description: Get vault state -- SOL balance, linked wallets, authority

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_FOR_WALLET
actions.description: Reverse lookup -- find which vault a controller wallet is linked to

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LENDING_INFO
actions.description: Get lending configuration for a domain token (rates, caps, active loans)

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LOAN
actions.description: Get loan position for a wallet -- collateral, debt, LTV, health status
